entry.title: Above the Fog
entry.content:
A big wall of low clouds rolled in as I was going out to shoot tonight; so I decided to try to get above the fog, near the top of Palos Verdes.

In this shot: you can see the sun descending into the clouds at left; Malaga Cove in the center, and Torrance Beach on the right side; with a layer of clouds covering most of the beach.

entry.title: Last Light on 26th St.
entry.content:
Last light, looking north at Santa Monica from 26th St. in Hermosa Beach.

Long exposure with very little light in the sky; plus I waved my iPhone flashlight at the lifeguard tower during the exposure :-)
